articles.author: Micah Hanks, Micah Hanks
articles.title: Rare Transient Luminous Event Captured in Imagery During International Space Station Experiment - The Debrief
articles.description: A rare transient luminous event was captured in imagery obtained during a recent experiment aboard the International Space Station (ISS).
articles.content:
A rare form of atmospheric phenomena known as a Transient Luminous Event (TLE) was successfully captured in imagery obtained during a recent experiment aboard the International Space Station (ISS).

articles.author: Kmele Foster, Brandon Stewart
articles.title: Consciousness: Not just a problem for philosophers - Big Think
articles.description: Consciousness isn’t just a problem for philosophers. On this episode of Dispatches, Kmele sat down with scientists, a mathematician, a spiritual leader, and an entrepreneur, all trying to get to the heart of “the feeling of life itself.”
